website_summaries.verdict: Super Monkey Ball: Banana Splitz's disappointing collection of minigames can't live up to the standards of classic Monkey Ball gameplay.
pros: Classic Monkey Ball levels are nicely challengingColourful visuals
cons: Minigames are dull and often confusingMultiplayer modes rely on those same minigamesEdit mode doesn't let you create your own courses

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: had this game for gamecube and loved it and still do.
customer_reviews.author: BellaSwan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these games. Fun, funny, challenging game. Works great on the Vita.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Monkey Ball Vita
customer_reviews.text: The single player is really good. I love the inclusion of the Monkey Bowling mini game except that you have to hold the Vita sideways and use touch controls.
customer_reviews.author: JoeyIA

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love the Monkey ball games and was looking forward to the Ps Vita version and it did not disappoint. It is great. I love the mini games, they are especially fun with another person. And the challenge courses are the same as the on the counsel, but on vita you can choose to use the stick or tilt. Awsome
customer_reviews.author: T. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Collectors item
customer_reviews.text: This game was cheezy but I needed it for the collection
customer_reviews.author: dearis

customer_reviews.title: video games
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my grandson who LOVES video games, and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Zakrzewski

customer_reviews.title: Rolling maze madness!
customer_reviews.text: It's like Marble Madness, but with monkeys for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: Raptor

customer_reviews.title: Nice Game, feels like the Originals
customer_reviews.text: Good game. If you've played the previous ones, this will be no surprise. Controls well. Good price. Would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good game, I play it using analog stick instead of the tilt feature the PS Vita comes with.
customer_reviews.author: Rolando

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this game! It feels just like the original from years ago.
customer_reviews.author: T J

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a teen girl. She loves it and thinks it a really great game.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Unique
customer_reviews.text: This game is a very unique game and a game vita owners should get if they want to experience all of what the vita can do. the graphics are perfect for the cartoon look and the gameplay is smooth and fun. its very challenging and very fun. the only thing wrong is that the game gets boring after a long time playing it. otherwise overall great buy
customer_reviews.author: Parker

customer_reviews.title: more ape fun
customer_reviews.text: if you love the wii and 3ds versions. than this is the game for you if you own a vita. new mechanics and same old fun you know and love.
customer_reviews.author: NEB

customer_reviews.title: so disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Other than this installment I have only played the Gamecube version of Super Monkey Ball. The Gamecube version is fantastic, rewarding, and simple to control. But SMB Banana Splitz lacks almost any camera control at all making it nearly imossible to steer or aim. I expected a challenge, but this is inaccessible and downright frustrating in the worst possible way. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Monkey Ball Banana Splitz
customer_reviews.text: Monkey Ball Banana Splitz is a fun game to play ... Great for all Ages to Play ... For a Good Time Buy this Game
customer_reviews.author: M. M. Werner

product_meta.title: Super Monkey Ball Banana Splitz - PlayStation Vita
product_meta.description: Over 100 stages spread across five exhilarating worlds made of Jungle, Clay, Wood, Metal and Cardboard.
feature_bullets: 8 mini-games including fan-favourite Monkey Target, Monkey Bingo, Number Ball and more
Tilt and touch or use the dual sticks to guide your monkeys through the game.
Create your own stages using PS Vita’s camera feature and share with friends.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars39 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
